data: The note "API Endpoint Documentation" documents the GET /api/v1/users/{id} endpoint for user profile retrieval.
The note "API Endpoint Documentation" records that the GET /api/v1/users/{id} endpoint responds with a JSON user object on HTTP 200.
The note "API Endpoint Documentation" records that the GET /api/v1/users/{id} endpoint responds with HTTP 404 when a user is not found.
The note "API Endpoint Documentation" serves as a detailed specification for the user retrieval endpoint including response codes.
The note "API Endpoint Documentation" is focused on backend API documentation for the user profile retrieval service.
